page.title: 11GARAGES
page.content:
There are four garages in the Clanfield area:-
{Horndean Service Station The garage sells 280 gallons of petrol each day. 150 cars visit the garage each day. {James Watts Automobiles} Ten people are employed at the garage.13 cars were on sale and 7 cars were repaired in a day. 400 gallons of petrol were sold daily. {Hilltop Service Station} 150 cars visit the garage daily and 2000 gallons of petrol are purchased.8 people work at this garage. It is the only garage in Clanfield which sells diesel. {Clanfield Garage} This garage does repairs only and does not sell petrol. 3 people work there.
